A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the best Star Wars films! After seeing the movie twice in theaters and really looking for reasons why some viewers didn’t give great ratings\, I’m still baffled. I liked it even more the second time. This is one of the best Star Wars movies without question. The final battle scene is a work of art...the way the Luke scene was shot with the subtle hints that he’s not physically there was spectacular. I think Star Wars “fans” need to take a second look and give this film the score it deserves. For once in my life I agree with the critics.
